bs-bluespiceconfigmanager-admintool-labe: Anchor text for the config manager.
bs-configmanager-discardchanges: Text for prompt that asks you if you want to discard changes made in config manager
bs-configmanager-noentry: Display text when no entry could be found in config manger search
right-bluespiceconfigmanager-viewspecial:
Grants access to the special page [[Special:BlueSpiceConfigManager]].
{{doc-right|bluespiceconfigmanager-viewspecialpage}}
log-name-bs-config-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type
log-description-bs-config-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logeventslist-bs-config-manager-log: Config manager log option label on [[Special:Log]]
logentry-bs-config-manager-modify:
Log message about changes in config manager.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the setting
* $5 - original value of the setting
* $6 - new value of the setting
